    public class PlayerChangeBalanceEvent

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerChangeBalanceEvent

        public PlayerChangeBalanceEvent(org.bukkit.entity.Player target,
                                Economy econ,
                                double amount,
                                double previousBal,
                                double newBal,
                                boolean isNatural)
        Called when a Player's Balance Changes
        Parameters:
        target - Target involved in this event
        econ - Economy involved
        amount - Amount added
        previousBal - Previous Balance
        newBal - New Balance (previousBal + amount = newBal is NOT being checked)
        isNatural - If this addition was natural
        See Also:
        PlayerEconomyEvent

    • Method Detail

      • isNatural

        public boolean isNatural()
        Whether or not this increase was caused by a natural event (i.e. fishing increase)
        Returns:
        true if natural, else false
